name: broadcastchannel
description: BroadcastChannel is a self-hosted tool leveraging the browser's BroadcastChannel API to sync real-time messages and state across tabs or windows in a simple way, suitable for lightweight data syncing.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync messages and state across browser tabs. Real-time updates

features.title: REST API
features.description: Leverages native browser API for efficiency. No external dependencies

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal overhead for simple data syncing. Fast performance

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Instant message propagation across tabs. Immediate updates

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Deploy your own synchronization service. Complete control
